summary: Blood Rain tells the story of a slew of grisly murders plaguing a small, fairly isolated island village. However, it's not just the mounting death toll that's causing residents to worry, ... See full summary »
cast: Seung-Won Cha|Yong-woo Park|Seong Ji|Se-ah Yun|Choi Jong-won|Ho-jin Chun|Hyun-Kyung Oh|Cheol-min Park|Hae-Jin Yoo|Jeong Gyu-Su|Jong-yun Lim|Ji-na Choi|Suk-Won Chang|Gyung-Yun Hong|Choon-ha Hwang|Wang-geun Kim|Ji-yun Seol|Young Soon So
title: Blood Rain
